title: Need to purchase: Tribeca, by Nikola Djurek
content:
I am interested in purchasing Nikola Djurek’s Tribeca, but cannot find it anywhere.

It is no longer available through stereotypehaus. Does anyone know how I can track down the designer, or someplace else to license it?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tribeca\_light.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012040/http:/typophile.com/files/tribeca_light.png) | 8.96 KB |

 [‹ Garamond is not Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37259 "Go to previous forum topic") [Futura ND – how to access old style numerals ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37482 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kstreble

comments.content:
Thanks Andy.

I gave his email a shot, but no response. I’m beginning to think he just doesn’t want to sell the face anymore.
Did you try the phone numbers? You know how spam filters are these days.
